    • splitCSV

      public static LinkedList<String> splitCSV(String input, String separator, int lineNumber) throws ParseException
      Splits a line of CSV into fields, taking quoting into account. Embedded double quotation marks are not considered (yet?).
      Parameters:
      input - Line to be split
      separator - String (typically a comma ",") to use as separator.
      lineNumber - Line number, only used for constructing error messages from un-balanced quotes.
      Returns:
      Linked list of fields.
      Throws:
      ParseException - in the presence of un-balanced quotes.

    • splitCSV

      public static List<String> splitCSV(String input, String separator) throws ParseException
      Throws:
      ParseException
